channel.title: Certificate issue (might be caused by timezones)
channel.description:
Hi Travis,
I had this issue moments ago: [https://i.imgur.com/vXrcoky.png](https://i.imgur.com/vXrcoky.png)
Might be a timezone related issue? Or maybe the certificate renewal process you've got set up has stopped.
Anyway, hope you and your family are well.
Kind regards,
Daniel (Lothy)
